title: Can you remove your ranked rank/division
body: I did my placements and played some games but i don't want to play ranked anymore till end of the season and don't want to finish in silver either so is there any chance to contact riot to remove your Season 7 rank/division ... since you can't get demoted in gold/silver/bronze divisions and bronze V is the lowest you can go ...???

replies.body:
As **DTN** mentioned, we cannot reset your ranked standing. If you don't want the silver border after the end of the season, you can reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) after we've sent ranked rewards out for the 2017 season and request we remove it. Ranked rewards won't go out until the season ends, though, so that won't be for quite a while.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

No, they can't mess with your Rank/LP/MMR at all. It's built that way to prevent abuse. If you don't want the season's rewards you can request they be removed after you receive them, but you're going to have the MMR and be considered whatever rank you were no matter what.

I don't really understand the purpose of your request, though.
